xl-ddm-data.description: Generic Offline Service Target Configuration Revision 1.0.0.0

Adapter.name: OTS Create Account
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Requests to create an account in an Offline Service.

AdapterVariable.name: targetSystem
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The technical properties to establish a connection.

AdapterResponseCode.name: OTS-00020
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Could not obtain requester login name from request.

AdapterResponseCode.name: OTS-00012
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Error invoking composite.

AdapterResponseCode.name: OTS-00010
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: The path to the Metadata Descriptor specifying the Attribute Mapping cannot be null or empty

AdapterVariable.name: compositeRevision
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The revision ID of the composite related to Identity Manager and/or Oracle SOA Suite.

AdapterVariable.name: compositeCategory
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The category of the workflow related to Identity Manager. Normally 'BPEL'.

AdapterVariable.name: compositeName
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The name of the SOA composite application.

AdapterResponseCode.name: SUCCESS
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Request was send

AdapterResponseCode.name: OIM-00001
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: An unhandled exception has occured

AdapterResponseCode.name: OIM-00002
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: An general exception has occured

AdapterResponseCode.name: OTS-00003
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Error encountered while connecting to SOA Server

AdapterResponseCode.name: OTS-00004
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Could create network connection to host on port specified in composite attributes

AdapterResponseCode.name: OTS-00005
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: The problem may be with physical connectivity or SOA Server is not alive

AdapterResponseCode.name: OTS-00006
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Invalid or incorrect Principal Name or Principal Password configured for SOA Server

AdapterResponseCode.name: OTS-00021
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Error in generating payload details for account.

AdapterVariable.name: compositeService
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The entry point to the composite workflow to start a process.

AdapterVariable.name: processInstance
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The Process Instance key providing the data for this provisioning tasks.

AdapterResponseCode.name: OTS-00022
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Could not obtain note data from process task.

AdapterVariable.name: Adapter return value
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: Return variable

AdapterVariable.name: compositeOperation
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The operation identifier of the workflow related to Identity Manager.

AdapterVariable.name: compositePartition
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The name of the partition in which the SOA composite application is deployed. The default value is 'default'.

AdapterVariable.name: provisioningDescriptor
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The path to the Metadata Descriptor specifying the Attribute Mapping of fields and their transformation that are part of a provisioning task.

AdapterVariable.name: compositePayload
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The payload identifier of the workflow related to Identity Manager.

AdapterVariable.name: processTask
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The Process Task key providing the data for this provisioning tasks.

AdapterResponseCode.name: OTS-00011
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: The composite configuration is incomplete.
